WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
If you create the following chart it will crash the Visual Studio designer:
 
<charting:Chart>
	<charting:Chart.Axes>
		<charting:DateTimeAxis Orientation="X" Interval="1" />
	</charting:Chart.Axes>
</charting>
WorkItem.Summary: DateTimeAxis with Orientation=X and Interval=1 crashes designer
